snippet: On the Media Decoder blog, a look at how President Obama grants more media interviews than his predecessors, but holds far fewer impromptu question-and-answer sessions.
abstract: On the Media Decoder blog, a look at how President Obama grants more media interviews than his predecessors, but holds far fewer impromptu question-and-answer sessions.

headline.main: Obama Favors Interviews Over Impromptu Q.&A.'s, Study Finds
